title: My Queen
overview: A 37-year-old confident woman, Paad, is the top marketer of â€˜Top Shopping', a well-known Online Shopping Company. She is a successful woman who led the company be in the front line of this industry. She put all efforts to work leaving no time to have any boyfriend. In the past, Paad was once about to marry with a famous documentary photographer Nond. However, the wedding was collapsed because Nond was disappeared, and Paad had never loved anyone again. One day destiny brought her to meet with a 25-years-old guy named Tan. He once was a medical student with an excellent study performance. However, Tan suddenly stopped his study after the loss of his girlfriend since he was too sad to continue. Without a degree, he must earn his living every way to get money until he accidentally became Paad's assistant. They worked closely day by day the same as a good feeling developed gradually and finally became love. But love always come with obstacles, not only a different living attitude from 12 years age gap, but also the return of Nond who wanted to renew a relationship with Paad. What would Paad choose between one guy whom she once wanted to marry and another guy whom she was happy to be with?
